definitions.text: having the same or similar characteristics
examples: friends are generally alike in background and taste

definitions.text: resembling or similar; having the same or some of the same characteristics; often used in combination
examples: a limited circle of like minds
members of the cat family have like dispositions
as like as two peas in a pod

definitions.text: capable of replacing or changing places with something else; permitting mutual substitution without loss of function or suitability
